1.content: Your sitting in your room looking at this app, still wondering what it really does. It can’t really warp people’s minds.... can it? You read the directions button and investigate. It says “Type in any stereotype you can think of, take a picture of someone, and watch the results. They must be looking at the flash for it to work. WARNING: COULD BE IRREVERSIBLE, USE AT OWN RISK.” Your overcome by so much boredom, you think you might as well try it out. Everyone is home since it’s a Saturday in summer, so you have a choice of anyone you want.
1.title: Give it a try

11.content:
You walk downstairs to you mom watching Grey’s Anatomy, drinking an iced tea. You walk behind her and realize your mom might think your weird taking a random picture of her, and you have to get the flash in her eyes. You also don’t want to bring it up right away either since she’ll think somethings up.

Alex: Hey mom
Mom: Yes, honey?
Alex: What are we having for dinner?
Mom: I was gunna make pork chops and broccoli but if you want something else you can take it out of the freezer!
Alex: Thanks, I’m cool with that though. Where’s Amanda?
Mom: She’s over at Julie’s, she got mad at me because she left her headphones in her pocket and I washed them.
Alex: How is that your fault?
Mom: That’s what I’m trying to say! And if you don’t like it do your own laundry, simple as that!.... Alex thank you for being the good kid haha.
Alex: Haha, it’s not that, she’s just crazy. She still acts like this when all you do is give
Mom: She can be, but at least she’s doing good in school. And don’t think I’m picking favorites, I love all three of you the same.
Alex: That reminds me, do you want to pose for a picture for my Instagram. It’s healthcare appreciation day and I want to post how great of a mom you are!
Mom: Sure! Just make sucking up to me for $20 less obvious next time haha.

You blush at the fact you have completely unrelated motivations than that, and start to feel guilty. But realize there’s almost no chance it works anyway so you put your worries aside. Your mom poses and you take the picture. What personality did you type?
11.title: Mom

111.content:
You show your mom the picture after you take it.

Alex: How do you like it?
Mom: Fine.
Alex: Do you want me to take another one?
Mom: No, I’ll look gross regardless.

Your mom gets up and finishes dinner, but you can see she’s sad and hated everything going on right now.

Alex: Are you alright mom?
Mom: I’ve never been alright.
Alex: What do you mean? Your usually always upbeat.
Mom: Fuck off.

Your taken back a step. Your mom has never been like this, this means the app must have worked. Your in complete shock.

You want to test this out though, take your mom somewhere to see what she does.
111.title: Emo

1112.content:
You get to the mall and are curious as to where she’ll go first, your not very surprised though when she farts to hot topic first. She picks out a Slipknot, My Chemical Romance, and a pentagram shirt first; then goes over to the pants and gets black jeans and leggings. After that gets new makeup, including black lipstick and eyeliner. She gets some other accessories like bracelets and hats and leaves.

Next stop is the piercing store, but your mom insists that you stay because she wants it to be a surprise. You figure this is a good time to try out that app again on a random person. You walk up to an old white lady with her husband and ask if they want a picture for $1, the lady says sure. You type in ghetto on the app and take the picture.

Alex: How do you like it?
Old Lady: Is cool blood
Old Man: What was that?
Old Lady: I said is cool nah les get to dat Joanne Fabrics sale yerd
Alex: Alright have a nice day!
Old lady: ard

You started to feel bad that old man’s wife will act differently forever and he has no idea why, but it was also the funniest thing you've ever heard of so you go on with your life.

Soon after though, your mom comes back and you could barely recognize her. She got snake bites on each side, a septum piercing, one through the bridge of her nose with spikes on the ends, two cheek piercings and some 30 mm gages. You realized this may have gone too far, there’s no way she could ever have her ears recover from that. You also realize your mom talks in a much more somber, depressed voice now.

Mom: Do you like them?
Alex: They look great, and as long as you like them!
Mom: So you hate them. I don’t care. I’m looking how I want from now on and nobody can stop me.
Alex: “Well I’m glad your more independent at least.” ( under breath)
Mom: Also I have a tattoo appointment at 4 so I’ll drop you off at home first, I might be there a while.
Alex: You've never even got a tattoo before, do you know how bad that hurts?
Mom: I just got my ears stretched out the size of a baseball, I hope it hurts more than that. Maybe I’ll feel something for once.

You get dropped off at home waiting for your mom to get back so you can see the damage. You thought if you switched your mom back now, she’ll freak out at what she’s done and actually kill herself rather than just talk about it.

She gets home, quietly walking through the door without saying a thing. You walk over to greet her and stand there in shock to what you see. You look from up down, on her cheek were two pentagrams around the piercings, a giant rose on her neck, a raven on her chest with blood on it. She takes her clothes off to show you the rest, starting with a tattoo of the devil nailed to a cross on her stomach which says “savior” above it, blood tattoos coming out of the bottom of her underwear, two skulls on her knees, and a huge spider on the back of one of her calves.

Mom: How do they look?
Alex: (stares)
Mom: Whatever

As she’s walking away you see a huge tattoo on her back of a creepy baby playing with a doll attached to the baby’s finger ligaments, with blood, skulls, and bats everywhere. You knew at this point you went too far, but it was too late to do anything. Your mom was going to be emo forever and there was nothing you could do. Instead of live with the guilt, you think of using the app on your self to give yourself a careless personality, so you could change anyone without feeling remorse.
1112.title: Go to mall

11121.content:
You type “careless” into the bar and take a selfie with the flash on. You don’t feel any different, so you decide to test it out. You go up to your moms room to make fun of her and see if you feel bad.

Alex: Hey mom, just wanted to remind you you’ll always be ugly.
Mom: You dont have to tell me, I know.

You don’t feel the need to say sorry or tell her you were joking, so it was finally time to be a soleless villain. Right after though, Amanda walls up behind you.

Amanda: Fuck you, mom is beautiful in every way you piece of shit. Why would you say that?!
Alex: Look at her real quick.

Amanda peeps in the door to see her mom with all of her body modifications and Hot Topic, Putting on her white powder and black makeup. She has the same expression you did when your mom walked through the door.

Amanda: What happened to her?
Alex: I have no idea, she just got all this stuff at the mall and started acting this way.
Amanda: She’s gunna loose her job with all those piercings and tattoos? What made her do this?

You started to think Amanda might start looking into what happened, you decide you have to change her personality fast to get her mind off it and onto One specific thing.

Alex: Maybe if I send her s picture of us we can remind her of what else she has in life.
Amanda: That’s kinda retarded, but worth a try

You point the camera at both of you and close your eyes right before the flash. What did you type in the bar?
11121.title: Change yourself

111211.content:
Alex: Damnit I closed my eyes, did you wanna try again?
Amanda: No, I’m actually starving out of nowhere. Do we have any sweets like cake or iced cream? OOOO! I have my protein shakes, that would be so good right now!

Your sister runs off as you give a slight grin, knowing your gunna have fun with this. Or is that enough changing your family for a while?
111211.title: A stuffer (Weight gain)

1112111.content:
You decide to keep changing your family since you don’t care what happened anyway, so you go downstairs to find your sister Lily.

You walk into the kitchen to see Lily helping Amanda make a cake. You see the new 2 liter of whole milk is already empty and protein powder everywhere.

Alex: What are you guys up to?
Lily: Amanda said if I help her make a cake I can have a piece, haha.
Amanda: A small piece.

You could tell by Amanda’s facial expression she wasn’t joking, but Lily assumed she was and kept laughing. You could already tell Amanda was full from those protein shakes since you’ve never even seen her stomach stick out before, she cared so much about her body you don’t think she’d ever even been full before.

Alex: Hey Lily do you wanna play I message games while you wait?
Lily: Sure!

You start playing her in battleship, then the basketball game, and 8 ball pool. You kept winning to the point where she got visibly angry. You thought maybe if you made her smarter she would start to win instead. You also thought of other random things you could make her.
1112111.title: Go do some more

11121111.content:
Alex: Would putting you on my Snapchat story make you feel better?
Lily: Maybe a little.
Alex: Okay, lets go outside where there’s better lighting.

You think about how smart this could make her, and take some percussions before. First you type in “submissive” so that if she gets too smart for your own good, you can control her. You take the first picture with your eyes closed and look to her.

Alex: How do you feel?
Lily: Fine, why?
Alex: Do a summer-salt.
Lily: (does summer-salt)
Alex: Cool, scream “Fuck!”
Lily: FUCK!!!

She might just be doing this for fun at this point, you have to make her do something weird.

Alex: Pick your nose and eat it.

Unflinching, she takes out a huge booger and eats it without breaking eye contact. You almost puke, but are excited for what you’ve accomplished. You then take another picture of her with the “genius” setting on and see what she knows.

Alex: Recite the Gettysburg Adress.
Lily: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent a new nation, conceived in Liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. Now we are engaged in a great civil war, testing whether that nation or any nation so conceived and so dedicated, can long endure. We are met on a great battle-field of that war. We have come to dedicate a portion of that...
Alex: Okay, okay I heard enough.. Who won the super bowl this year?

You knew she couldn’t know this one since our family never watches football and when I asked her yesterday she said she didn’t know any teams.

Lily: Based on telling statistics such as QBI, yards per carry, red-zone percentage plays and previous accolades, I predict the Kansas City Chiefs won... Barring Patrick Mahomes doesn’t came back 100% and Bill O’Brian is a competent coach.

Your taken back a step, she even understands football jokes and can remember speeches she’s never read before. This app didn’t make her seem smarter, it turned her into maybe one of the smartest people on the planet. And right as you think that, you start to get another evil idea.

Alex: Do you think you’d be able to rob a bank?
Lily: One around here, I could be back home with the money before dinner. Something like JP Morgan Chase would probably take me a couple days to plan and execute.

Your not sure what that is, but after looking it up you realize it’s the biggest bank in America. Do you want to go for the big score, or just keep doing what you’ve been doing?
11121111.title: Genius

111211112.content:
You pull up to your local Citizens Bank, shaking and sweating all over. You really have no idea if she can pull this off, but you just took a ten year olds advice to rob a bank so you deserve whatever your getting you think.

Lily: Park two parking lanes over and when I give the signal, drive over and pick me up. Then we’ll follow the marked directions on your GPS and we’re gone.
Alex: Alright just try to make it quick as possible.
Lily: Obviously...

You park the car and Lily gets out with a ski mask and a gun in her waist. You sit back and try to stay incognito while Lilly’s getting it done. You look up through the window at their pointing a gun at the tellers demanding money. Your heart rate gets higher and higher, waiting for the signal to drive by. You see her get a big bag of money and start walking out. Behind her though you see see a middle aged mad grab at her mask and begin to pull it off. Lily falls to the ground, with her hand on her head to keep the mask on, turns around before hitting the ground, and shoots the man between the eyes. You start to have a panic attack and drive off. You keep going without looking back and get on the main road, horrified what could happen to your sister. What do you do?
111211112.title: Rob local bank

1112111121.content:
The guilt gets to you and you go back to get her. A random flash of adrenalin hits you and you pull up right next to the bank.

Lily: Did you just try and leave me?
Alex: I’m sorry i got scared!
Lily: It doesn’t matter just drive!

You are instantly boxed in by police and your body flushed white. Lily pulls out the gun and shoots half the officers with perfect accuracy. This was the only chance of getting out of this not in hand cuffs. The assault fails however and Alex and Lily are gunned down by police outside the bank, sprayed to a point you can’t recognize them.
1112111121.title: Go back for her

1112111122.content:
You get home, and strangely don’t feel anything about leaving your sister back there. To you it’s just another statistic going to jail that doesn’t effect you. You go inside and see Amanda cooking dinner.

Alex: Why are you cooking and not mom?
Amanda: Mom said she was too sad to cook right now, or do anything to be honest.. plus mom always makes super healthy food, I’ll make good food from now on since mom let’s me go grocery shopping now.
Alex: What are you making then?
Amanda: Like a pound of spaghetti with my special sweet sauce and big meat balls. I’m also putting bacon and four cheeses on with Italian bread on the side.

You see her dump almost a cup of sugar into the marinara sauce and almost gag. She really is dedicated to gaining weight. You could see she was in pain from how full she was, her back was bent from how protruding her stomach was. She was still skinny but at this rate you’d give it like a week before some love handles and flab.

Amanda: What do you want for desert, cake or cinnamon rolls?
Alex: Didn’t you just make a cake earlier?
Amanda: Ya that’s long gone though, that reminds me where’s Lily?

Right after she says that you see Lily walk through the door. You run over to tell her a command before she kills you for leaving her, but she just looks up and says, “The money’s in the garage.”

Alex: Your not mad?
Lily: I had just as good of a chance getting out of there on foot, cops are way too dumb for their payroll.

You go in the garage and see a duffel bag full of money. You go through it and bet there’s at least $100,000. You take it up to your room without anyone seeing and put it under your bed. What’s the next move?
1112111122.title: Keep going home

11121111221.content:
You sit at the table and join the rest of your family as Amanda brings the food over. You can see your dad is visibly confused, you think you might as well change him too. But a side of you wants to see where the conversation goes first. When you sit down, Lily takes the recommended amount for a nutritious diet, mom takes a small scoop; knowing she’s too fat for any more, and Amanda dumps like half the bowl on her plate, along with one of the two loaves of garlic bread.

Dad: Dang Amanda, Dave some for the rest of us haha.
Amanda: If you want more food you can make it..
Dad: Honey, that’s an... interesting new look.
Mom: Thanks..
Dad: Whats it for, one of Alex’s video’s for school.

He pulls at one of your mom’s nose piercings, thinking they were magnets or something.

Mom: OWW! What the fuck!
Dad: What the hell? Did you get real piercings?!
Mom: Yes you fucking normie, maybe I like to express myself unlike you. Nobody understands how fucking horrible my life is and how horrible humanity is in general, I wish this planet would just die so I could be in peace and all these insignificant, superficial, idiots could experience the hell I do every day!!!

Your mom storms out of the room, everyone in shock just stares at each-other. After a second though Amanda goes back to chowing down.

Dad: What the hell was that, what the hell happened to your mother?!
Lily: She underwent a severe chemical imbalance in here brain to the point her preconceived notions of life are reassembled to suit what an outside source commanded it to be.
Dad: What?
Alex: Screw it.

What do you make your dad’s personality?
11121111221.title: Go downstairs for dinner

111211112212.content:
You take a picture of your dad real quick before he can respond and just stares at you for a second.

Alex: Dad, how you feelin?
Dad: dada
Alex: perfect.
Lily: How will our family be attaining money now that our parents are compromised?
Alex: We will Lily, do you think we can get away with another heist?
Lily: There’s a 97.3% chance I can successfully rob any bank in the area.
Alex: let’s hit another lick then..

As you say this you smell shit in the air and already know what happened, as your dad falls out of the chair and starts crying.

Alex: Lily, you’ll be dads new caretaker as well, since you know better than anyone... about anything I guess.
Lily: Will do, how would you like me to raise him?
Alex: Strictly, I want him to do all the chores plus more that I’ve done in my life. And if he defies you, beat him. It won’t hurt but he’ll respect you and fear when you threaten him.
Lily: I already know, can you go to the store though and get baby supplies and adult diapers. I would go but I obviously can’t drive due to my age, even though I could arrive sooner with less probability of casualties.
Alex: Why don’t you just pupils a teleportation machine to get there hehe.
Lily: I get on that after I change our father.

You didn’t know if she was serious or not, but you shrugged it off. You get in your dads car and make your way to..
111211112212.title: Toddler

1112111122121.content:
You walk in and look around for adult diapers, since it’s going to be the hardest thing to find. After asking an associate, she takes you to them, and you see the same old couple you saw at the mall that one day.

Old lady: What up blood, how you been.
Alex: Good, how about you guys?
Old lady: Boolin, you know how it is.

The old man grabs you and takes you to the side.

Old Man: What did you do to my wife? She hasn’t been the same since the day we saw you at the mall. She’s been acting like a fucking nigger since then!

Your taken back a step, since your not racist at all and we’re raised to treat everyone fair. You were thinking of helping him and switching her back, but now all you want to do is mess with him. You type “severe Tourette and dimentia.” You take a picture of him and see if this thing can even give people diseases.

Alex: How do you feel?
Old man: Cornbread....SHIT!!!
Alex: What was that?
Old man: Baked beans....baked boys..FUCK ASS!! What’s harmonizing?!

You realize you just ruined this guys life and start to feel bad, but his wife comes over and grabs him.

Old lady: Cmon dawg, we gotta bounce. Good seeing you cuz.
Old man: Buddy buddy SHIT BALLS!!! When’s here?

You wave goodbye to the most entertaining couple you’ve ever met to this point and make your way over to the baby section. You see a famous YouTube star Alisa Violet walking down the aisle, and you can’t pass up on the chance to see your app play a role in popular media.

Alex: Alisa! I’m your biggest fan!
Alisa: Fuck off creep.
Alex: Can I just get a picture?
Alisa: I said fuck off before I call the cops!
Alex: Why you gotta be such a bitch, damn..
Alisa: What did you say?!

As she turns around to scold you, you point the phone at her to catch her off guard. What did you type?
1112111122121.title: Walmart

11121111221211.content:
Alisa: I recon you want your ass beat! I’m not sure why I never got an open carry license for fuckers like you. Now that I think of it I might as well get my fishing license while I’m here.
Alex: Sorry I didn’t respect your privacy, sometimes I don’t take other people’s feelings into account..
Alisa: Aw your good buddy, I think I snapped cus I haven’t had a dip in... we’ll ever. Why am I addicted to something I never had? Was it that fancy lookin smart phone?
Alex: No, it can’t do stuff like that.. it can take your number though.
Alisa: If you got a big yard and some dirt bikes, you got yourself a date. I’ll catch y’all later though!

You can’t believe you just got Alisa Violet to think your cute. Since you made her country she must like your bigger beard and slightly dirty clothes, weird.

When you get home, you walk through the door to your dad running around the house naked with your little sister chasing him.

Alex: Here’s the diapers and stuff you asked for.
Lily: Oh thank god..Get back here or I’ll beat you again! Time to put your diapers on and drink your bottle!
Dad: (cries loudly)
Lily: Ugh, I need a drink..
Alex: You've never drank before, how do you know lol.
Lily: You ask the dumbest questions.. just get that Jack bottle from off of the fridge and give it to me.

You and your sister both take a shot, you gag but she seems perfectly fine.

Alex: Do you not taste it?
Lily: No, I’ve calculated the perfect angle to consume it without it making contact with anything before hitting the stomach.

You start to get curious to how smart Lily might be. You ask her the big question sitting in the balcony taking more shots.

Alex: Lily... Is there a god?
Lily: No, there is no spiritual god that many people would think of. Mother Nature is the closest thing we have to a god, even though there isnt any one entity....
But the next closest thing would most likely be you.
Alex: What did you say?
Lily: Anyone that can make a being like me must have godly powers, I am near ethereal with the kind of power you’ve given me.

That got you to thinking, maybe you were a god. Why did this random app even appear on your phone? Why did whatever put it there do it? This was a major turning point for Alex, did he want to continue to stay around his family and observe their lives, or strive for something more. With an army of people like Lily but more powerful and resilient, you would be unstoppable. The choice is up to you..
11121111221211.title: Country

choices: Go back downstairs after a couple hours
111211112212111.content:
A couple months passed by, you wake up in your brand new bed from all the money from the bank with infinite energy it feels like. You walk past the bathroom to see your mom doing her makeup.

Alex: Sup mom?
Mom: Living in hell.. how about you?

She has covered her body in tattoos by now, below her head you can barely tell what skin color she is. This is in addition to her two tattoos where her eyebrows would be, that she shaved off, that says, “GOD” and “DEAD” with an “is” in the middle to add context.

Mom: Do you like my new tattoos?

She said this spitting all over the bathroom, seeming like she can’t control it. You tell her to open her mouth and see her tongue is cut down the middle, sliced in half.

Alex: What the fuck mom?! You don’t even look like a person!
Mom: That’s the best news I’ve heard my whole life, the less I look like you retarded skin bags the better I feel about myself. Now fuck off.

You go downstairs to see Amanda making breakfast and your dad and Lily playing video games. Your sister turns to bring a mound of pancakes to the table when you really start to notice her changes. Her tones stomach is now a slightly hanging belly with love handles. Her waist has gotten bigger in general, now having a pretty round ass instead of cut. Her cheeks are also starting to look like a cabbage patch doll.

Alex: Hey Amanda, just curious.. how much have you gained in the last few months?
Amanda: Around 40 pounds I think, I’m not far off from my goal weight but I think I might want to get even bigger after that, we’ll see.
Alex: Well you do you I guess.

Everyone gets to the table and you start eating. You got 3 pancakes, mom got 1, dad got 5 baby ones, Lily got 2, and Amanda got 6 or 7, before going back in for more.

Alex: So Lily, I heard Joe saying some new words the other day.
Dad: twuck
Lily: It’s “truck” Joe, don’t make me remind you..
Dad: Truck...
Lily: Good boy.
Mom: I’m glad he can’t talk, maybe we should just kill him and eat him before he can.
Alex: What the fuck mom?
Mom: One less person to feed and hear cry. Besides, I would love to feel the soul leaving someone’s body, biting into his sinful body and cleansing mine of this human food.
Amanda: Mmm... we’ll see how hungry I get.
Alex: Shut up guys, this isn’t even funny.

You go to your room in disgust, trying to wipe the weird images your mom gives you from your head. You go on your phone and..
111211112212111.title: Stick around

111213.content: What else can she become?
111213.title: Other option

112.content:
Alex: Do you like it?
Mom: I look so weak.. I need to get to the gym ASAP
Alex: You look fine mom.
Mom: Like you would know, you got a little flabby the last couple years. You can come with me if you want!
Alex: I’m cool mom.. thanks anyway I guess.

Your mom comes home after 4 or 5 hours, sweaty with a huge amount of grilled chicken and vegetables in hand.

Mom: I bet you can guess what we’re having for dinner, and tomorrow haha. We’re about to start eating way more healthy.

Do you want to see what happens after a while or change her again?
112.title: Powerlifter

choices: Your mom is standing right there
1121.content:
After about a year, your mom has gotten huge with the help of some very experimental steroids. She went from an in shape 5’8, 127 lbs. to 220 lbs of pure muscle. Her body was most resembling Arnold Schwarzeneggar with boobs and legs twice as big. Her biceps were about a foot around, and her neck was almost non existent behind her massive chest and traps. Her voice has also gotten much deeper, along with the steroids making her angry all the time. She was also famous for being the champion in the woman’s Ms. Universe after one year. You see her in the kitchen making a fruit snack.

Alex: Hey mom, what’s...

Before you can say anything you see an elbow go in your face, then darkness.

You wake up in a hospital bed, slowly coming to...
1121.title: Wait a year

choices: Your mom juicing on a bench
11211.content:
The doctor explains you’ve been in a coma for two years, your whole family except your mom are there. They start crying in joy finally seeing you get up.

Alex: What happened?
Dad: You startles your mom a few years ago and she elbowed you in the head, it put you in a coma from the force.
Alex: Where is mom?
Amanda: She’s not how you remember, even after she started getting in shape.

You look up your moms name on your phone and are astonished about what you see. She’s turned into undoubtedly the biggest human ever.

Dad: The stuff she was taking had special hormones in it that changed her in other ways than muscle mass. She’s about 8 feet tall now, over 400 pounds of pure muscle. Your lucky she knocked you out when she did.. she’s killed multiple people before on accident... stepping on someone or even bumping into people.
Alex: And she hasn’t gotten arrested or anything?
Dad: How are you gunna arrest someone like that, unless she goes on a rampage and they have to kill her... your not stopping her.
Alex: Dad your making it seem like she’s a super villain now haha.

Everyone just kind of looked at him, thinking they might as well show him themselves.

You get home to a new mansion in Beverly Hills.

Alex: I can’t believe this is our house now, mom is a superstar!
Dad: Oh she’s more than a superstar... her attitude definitely resembles one.

You walk into your new mansion and see a butler.

Butler: You must be Alex... nice to meet you.
Alex: Thanks, our too... Where’s my mom?
Butler: She’ll be in her private work out for a couple more hou...
Alex: I’m sure she won’t mind.

You walk over to the gym and see...
11211.title: It’s 2 years later

112111.content:
You walk in and see your mom with a pump in her arm, connected to this huge machine. Your mom doesn’t even look human anymore. She looks more like Bane from Arkham City, but taller, bigger legs, and more cut. She pulls the tube out of her arm.

Mom: Alex! I’m surprised you made it, if I hit you the same way now you’d probably die pussy! Haha!
Alex: Nice to see you too mom... So how’s life been?
Mom: I think you can see how life’s been... pretty fucking awesome. I come across anyone I don’t like.. punch them in the face, if they live they earned it haha!
Alex: What the hell.. How many people have you killed?
Mom: At least 100... maybe 200, I’ve been on a streak the last couple months, just walk up to someone alone and grab their mouths so they don’t scream. I’ll brutalize them depending how pissed I am.
Alex: Like how?
Mom: If their lucky I’ll just snap their neck, if I’m pissed I’ll tear off a few limbs first. It feels like breaking a toothpick to me... it’s amazing.
Alex: Dont you think it’s bad to do that... maybe...
Mom: I don’t really care if it is, and if anyone outside this house knows this whole family’s gunna get their body parts switched. Is that clear?
112111.title: Your mom juicing on a bench

1121111.content:
You go for the huge needle to try and stab your mom through the heart or something. Before you can get to it she grabs you by the leg and holds you upside down.

Mom: I always thought I raised a smarter boy than this... maybe that first hit scrambled your brains.

You scream for a second before your mom pulls your head and spine right out of your body. She starts drinking the spilling blood and guts flowing out of your body.
1121111.title: Retaliate

Jess: What? No.. I mean.. that’s cool. I think it looks good on you though haha. I’m trying to get to 300 by the end of the year.
Alex: That would be hot.

You blurt that out of nowhere, it just came out of you like you’ve been wanting to say it.

Jess: Really... maybe You can come over and you feed me a shake or two haha.
Alex: Uhhh.. It’s a date.
154121231.title: Go to Dairy Queen

1541212311.content:
You get to her house after dropping off Lily and meet her mom at the door. She looks at you up and down in confusion.

Tammy: Hello, who are you?
Alex: Hey, I’m Jess’s friend.
Tammy: Of coarse, you seem like someone she’d hang out with. She’s upstairs.

You walk into her room and get grabbed from behind. Jess sits you down in a chair and handcuffs you.

Alex: What the hell?!
Jess: I thought I might have some fun first, I knew you wouldn’t gain with me so I’m making you. For every shake I drink I’m making you too until you like it.
Alex: Please dont...

She chugs a whole funnel full of weight gain shake then tears your shirt in half, showing your huge gut and boobs. She grabs one and says she’s gunna get them as big as hers were.
1541212311.title: Go over

info.brief_description: An app that can change anyone’s personality to what you want.
info.description:
The story starts with you, an 18 year old boy named Alex, sitting in his room. In the middle of a boring summer before college, your looking for something to do after sitting on your bed for a week. You then realize there’s a random app downloaded in your phone called “Switcher” that you find out can change the personality of anyone you want!

Characters

Alex: 18, 5’10, 200 lbs, relaxed, reserved, slightly overweight, plays football

Mom (Sandy): 42, 5’8, 127 lbs, sociable, nice, caring, overprotective, good shape, nurse

Dad (Joe): 50, 6’0, 250 lbs, old fashioned, strict, good, fat, architect

Older Sister (Amanda): 20, 5’5, 130 lbs, hard working, nice, very athletic, cut, runs track at WVU

Younger Sister (Lily): 10, 4’6, 65 lbs, friendly, playful, smart, average

*I encourage you guys to add more, just try and keep it cannon and the device can’t cause physical changes unless the host does it to themselves. This family is also based in LA so it’s not uncommon to run into famous people.
